website_summaries.verdict: The ergonomic shape on this inflatable camping pillow makes it a good choice that takes up hardly any space when you fold it down for storage.
pros: Designed on a curve to support your neck
Has a push button quick deflate function
Comes with an eye shade for better sleeping
cons: The model is fully inflatable and  can have a tendency to leak a bit

customer_reviews.title: Super light, small, easy to stuff, and doesn't deflate.
customer_reviews.text: It's a no frills, very light, inflatable pillow. It didn't deflate during the night, which I appreciated. It's easy to attach to a pack with minimal weight and easy to stuff. It isn't big though so you may want to check dimensions. The mask was a nice bonus. My biggest complaint is not with the product, but inflatable pillows, which constantly shoot away from me in the night. Having a cover may increase friction and reduce that, but it is not required. For regular camping, I need a larger foam pillow personally, but if you need a small pillow for emergency use or if weight and space is a serious issue, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality pillow to add to your sleep system!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to help improve my sleep during backpacking trips. I'm a side sleeper and bought this along with a new camping pad. I noticed that blowing up the pillow was easy in 2-4 blows. It really helped keep my neck from hurting though out the night. For me it feels more comfortable sleeping on my back or on my stomach. Side sleeping it's a little low but still comfortable. On a side note, my partner tried the pillow out at home when we got it and quickly fell asleep on the pillow. Said it was very comfortable. Lifetime Guarantee is pretty awesome but haven't had to call for a replacement for defects.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Good for arthritic neck.
customer_reviews.text: This camping pillow is wonderful. My neck has degenerative disk disease (think arthritis). If it does not receive adequate support, my fingers go numb and I feel pain. In the past, I have used rolled up clothes and much smaller pillows, but they didn't really work because I am predominantly a side sleeper. I used this in my hammock and on the ground, and it was warm, soft, adjustable, and comfortable. 2.9 grams is not a lot of weight for a good night's sleep. I was concerned about the seam where the two sides meet, but that turned out to not be an issue at all. I can recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but failed in the end :/
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for a hiking trip. Don't get me wrong, these pillows are perfect for hiking and perfect for not taking up to much space. Unfortunately, they only lasted 4 nights through one hiking trip. Our second trip, we were pumped to have them and they inflated, but, they didn't stay inflated. Throughout each night, they would slowly deflate and become useless. We would literally wake up and re-inflate them. Kind of disappointing in that they didn't last very long. Overall, good for a couple of nights and then just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Small and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I got tgis for when I travel or go camping but dont want to bring a big pillow. This fits very nicely in any travel bag and is about the size of an apple. It even came with eye covers if you are trying to sleep in the day! Very easy to fill vent compared to a normal inflatable nub. Durable amd flexible construction ensures that it does not pop or rib. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airplane lumbar support!
customer_reviews.text: This little pillow is travel perfect. Although it is listed as a camping pillow, I purchased it to provide some lumbar support on long plane trips- after about 5 hours coach seats really start to take a toll on your back. This little pillow is the perfect size! I was surprised at how quickly it inflated- only took a few breaths. Importantly, it is also easy to de-inflate and packs into a tiny little bag. Haven't tried it for sleeping, but the size seems right for that as well. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Easy traveling
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who is a huge outdoors man & gets lost in the woods for days. So I think it’ll be perfect for him to be able to load up, deflate it & move on to the next camp site. Being winter, he hasn’t had the opportunity to try it out. The shipping was super fast. The product quality was good. If anything changes with the pillow during his hiking trips, I will change my review of it.
customer_reviews.author: EmBeth

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this pillow to work, I do a lot of bicycle touring and I'm trying to cut down on bulk and weight in my packs, inflatable seemed like a great idea, and it still is a great idea, just need to figure out a way to make the blow hole seal better. The first time I used it, for a weekend it worked great. But, I just returned from a 2 week tour and each night it lost more and more air, I was having to blow it up during the night, by the last night I blew it up twice. It's in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: mwrbush

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pillow for RV travel!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, compact, inflatable pillow! Super-comfortable lumbar support, soft material to sleep on, great for long distance car travel or binge watching TV on the couch. I use it for back support on my RV dinette seat cushion that is too deep for proper posture. Folds up small, stuff sack included, brilliant one-way inflation valve. Superb customer service. Fast response to a question I had. Prompt resolution of the issue. Happy customer! Note, I received a gift card in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I am about to embark on a 14 day bus tour of the Canadian Maritime Providences, and realized that I might need a travel pillow for my back and neck. After reading the reviews, I ordered this Chillax pillow, and when it arrived, and I inflated it, I couldn't believe it's size! It's a perfect! I can easily store it in my purse, and just a few puffs of air inflates it to the size and support needed. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Toes

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and very light weight for travel
customer_reviews.text: In a few months I will flying to Honduras on a medical mission trip. I have been researching sleeping bags, inflatable pillows and inflatable sleeping pads. Our medical team will be sleeping in sleeping bags. During my research, I came across CHILLAX products that meet all my expectations. CHILLAX products are quality made, durable, comfortable and very light weight for travel. Amazon order# 112-4534899-550644. Thanks CHILLAX for helping me to have a great night sleep after a day helping others.
customer_reviews.author: sandra ballard

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, stretchy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many pillow combinations while backpacking. - Rolled up clothes (usually too firm, bumpy, not super comfortable, wake up with neck pain) - foam pillow (compresses too much and doesn't give support, wake up with neck pain) - Inflatable foam pillow (worked pretty well, but bulky and made noisy crinkle sounds when moving) This is the first inflatable pillow i've seen that was all of the following: - affordable - small - quiet (i hate crinkle sounds in my pillow!) - COMFORTABLE! It's no hotel pillow or memory foam miracle, it's still a backpacking pillow, keep this in mind. But as far as super small and lightweight pillows go this is the best i've tried so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Finally- a Pillow that Works!
customer_reviews.text: So, I've been camping with the Scouts almost every month for a year. I started with a plush pillow, but it's too big for backpacking. I tried to use the inflatable pillow that was attached to my sleeping pad- that was just miserable. I then attempted to stuff clothes in a day bag- that just made me MORE miserable. After talking to some fellow parents, I finally caved and purchased this inflatable pillow. It took seconds to inflate and it's awesome! It's nothing like my old inflatable pillow- somehow it manages to not "feel" like it's just full of air. Bonus- it packs down to practically nothing which is huge for backpacking!
customer_reviews.author: IbeforeJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Light!
customer_reviews.text: My family just bought 4 of these to take on a long backpack trip. We were tired of using balled-up clothes, and needed to be as light as possible. These take about 2 breaths to inflate, and deflate into almost nothing. Comes with a bag that we didn't even use for backpack but will be good for storage. Also comes with sleeping mask, which turned out to be awesome with the full moonlight! Best purchase! Only downside is how slippery these little buggers can be. I put a t-shirt over mine which was better. My kids just kept sliding off of their pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Valve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to hike the Oregon portion of the Pacific Crest Trail. 2.5 weeks in the valve failed and air would leak out. It was really disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Oates

customer_reviews.title: My favorite backpacker pillow ever.
customer_reviews.text: I am as back packer and I love this pillow. It's easy to inflate and deflate. Takes only seconds due to the large valve. It never leaks or goes flat by morning. I use it as a bladder inside my kelty pillow to give the kelty some support which I can adjust to being perfect by adding just the right amount of air. The kelty has traditional filling that has no support but the combination gives me support plus comfort and the stability of the pillow not floating around like most do with how light and slippery air pillows are.
customer_reviews.author: como651

customer_reviews.title: Check product before use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow months ago for an upcoming trip (that I am on right now), and I told my husband to leave the pillows in their cases since they were so nicely packed. Well, turns out we should have checked the pillows because his pillow came without the rubber piece you stick in the air hole to stop air from coming out. Now we are on our trip and his pillow goes flat every night. Check the product before using it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for camping and especially backpacking. It’s extremely lightweight, and inflates and deflates easily. The neck support is good but not the same as a memory foam pillow, but I doubt that’s possible in an inflatable camping pillow. I’m most comfortable sleeping on my side with one under my head and one between my knees. The pillow is reasonably priced, so purchasing two is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rra104

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for Camping and Unsupportive Hotel Pillows
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pillow two years ago for a camping trip and have found myself using it frequently since. The pillow inflates easily and packs up tightly. It's easy to adjust the firmness. The product is strong and durable. I travel frequently for work and have found that it's handy to bring along. Hotel pillows are incredibly unpredictable -- even at the nicer hotels. I often inflate this and put it under the hotel pillow to provide additional support. I makes sleeping in strange beds much easier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for backpacking and it completely fills the bill. It is lightweight, compact, and inflates with 2 - 3 breaths. It is very comfortable and stays put in my sleeping bag. When it is time to break camp, a quick press on the deflation button and it is ready to be packed back into its stuff sack. The sleep mask was a pleasant bonus. It is comfortable and effective against other camper's head lamps as well as car lights. I highly recommend this product combination!
customer_reviews.author: Jarold S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Did not stay inflated for more than 40 minutes. ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not stay inflated for more than 40 minutes. Had my doubts when I was offered a gift card to amazon in exchange for a review, but thought I'd try it anyway. I'll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Wellax inflatable pillows after reading many positive reviews and I was not disappointed. They were easy to fully inflate with only three or four breaths and easy to adjust or deflate with the two way valve. They are a well made product, comfortable and quiet to sleep on, and are easily stored in a pouch the same size as a coke can. All these features at a fraction of the cost of the high priced pillows. What's not to like, and I didn't even mention the silk mask that is included. I would definitely buy this quality product again
customer_reviews.author: Pioneer 49

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack, mediocre comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is nice size-wise for backpacking because it folds down into such a small, lightweight bag. I have another foam camping pillow that is pretty bulky and also not very comfortable to sleep on, but the actual material is nicer against your skin. This pillow has a bit of a plastic-y feel and slides around quite a bit, so I ended up putting one of my shirts over it to sleep on, which was fine. For backpacking, you really do "get what you pay for", so this is okay for short 1-2 night trips where you need a lightweight pack.
customer_reviews.author: Andie K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight. Comfortable. Easy to use. Cons: No strap for securing to Sleeping pad. Not very thick/little too small, only about 3in high when inflated. Overall, it's good for what I need. Which is a second pillow. I like to be proper up when Sleeping. I'll be using this in conjunction with the Trekology pillow, which in my opinion, is much better, even though it weighs more.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service/Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice. Easy to inflate with a couple breaths. Unfortunately, the pillow lost roughly 1/2 it's air overnight. Tested this on consecutive nights and woke up the next morning to a partially deflated pillow, which is disappointing. UPDATE (9/13/18): Well, I can honestly say this company takes customer service very seriously and ensured I was satisfied with my purchase by exchanging for one that worked. Hard to find companies that stand behind their products, but I'm happy to report this one does. Thank you for making things right!
customer_reviews.author: DTP

customer_reviews.title: Very bad air pillow/Wellax
customer_reviews.text: I bought two new ones. They deflated after two nights. Both pillows deflated within two nights on our two week camping trip. Pathetic lack of quality control and improvement. I wouldn't take or buy this pillow on a one night camping trip. It simply doesn't work and deflates itself.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how great this pillow was. It was so affordable and with the reviews, I just had to get this pillow. I opened my prime package and was shocked by how small the pillow was rolled up. Smaller than the size of a soda can. I unrolled everything and to my surprise, there was an eye mask in there too! I was nervous about blowing it up but it literally took 3 pumps of air then done! So easy. I am using it for back support for a long airplane trip and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: My first time backpacking was a success with this guy!
customer_reviews.text: So I've never been backpacking before, and decided to buy this pillow for my trip. It was super tiny and lightweight (I fit it in my clothes sack), blew up in 3 breaths, and stayed completely inflated the entire night. The material was soft so I didn't need to cover it with anything, and the pillow was perfect height for me. I slept like a baby. No other friends brought pillows and all of their necks hurt in the morning. My boyfriend who hiked the AT decided to steal my pillow for a little bit, and after trying it out, said he was going to buy one for himself! Plus at the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, very compact, easy to inflate/deflate and very comfortable. It is perfect for a hiking trip. I never used an inflatable pillow before because I felt that it was wasted added weight into my pack but this little pillow made a remarkable difference in the quality of my sleep in the tent after a long hiking day. From now on, it will always have a space in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like it would be comfortable but doesn’t hold air - gradually deflates over first two hours of use until I wake up to find I have no pillow. Can’t work out how to contact seller to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: fully deflates after 10 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all the fake positive reviews. It was the worst purchase I ever made on Amazon. Product deflated after 10 minutes of use. I took it for 12 day camping trip and it was very disappointing to find out that the pillow does not hold air at all. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for camping but it's now in my travel bag for the car, airplane, airport, etc. Comes in a small case that I love and folds down small when not in use. Extremely easy to inflate and stays inflated! Love the valve system on this. Bonus for me - the aqua blue is my favorite color so it matches my other blue travel items. Also, it comes with a bonus eye cover which will be great for airplane trips!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few types of camping/backpacking pillows for my family’s backpacking trip this summer. We tried them out at home and noted how much they slipped out from underneath our heads in our bed. However, tent camping showed us that it was nearly impossible to keep it under our heads for the adults. It works well for the kids. The bag is perfect and easily repacks.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati momma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are awesome! My six year old and I are very happy with our pillows. We can't wait for our three day float trip. They blow up easily and hold air as you blow verses letting the air release like my husbands. It is easy to control firmness. The air whole is in the back so that it doesn't bother you, my husbands is in the front and back so you hit it while sleeping. The eye mask is just a great little plus!
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA

customer_reviews.title: I really love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This a really cool pillow. I have owned a lot of travel pillows in my day, and this one is by far the best. I love how compact it is when it is folded up. It blows up easily and is the perfect size for traveling. Great for the car, or a plane, or camping! It's awesome. And it comes with an eye mask! Can't wait to use it on our upcoming trip to Japan!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mcmuff

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for our first road trip. Price is better than competitors price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pillows. Both worked well for our first road trip and camping for 3 weeks from West to East and South to North of US and back. Easy to inflate and deflate. Holds air all night long. Price is better than competitors price. Based on my current experience I would recommend it to try. Will update if I notice any chances during my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Zakiryenok

customer_reviews.title: Only three uses....
customer_reviews.text: Initially I fell in love with the ease of inflation and comfort of this pillow. After only THREE uses there is now a tiny leak that I cannot find that makes this product useless. 😔 I never will earrings while using and always placed it back in it's pouch. Super bummed this was not a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Nhscoach

customer_reviews.title: Sleep mask bonus is high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow, really comfortable, and the sleep mask is large and soft. Only complaint is that it's difficult to get all of the air out without some sort of mechanism to keep the keep the button depressed. I think others have a button that clicks in to stay open while you're rolling. It still rolls up to be really small, but it's a back and forth between rolling and letting air out. Not a huge deal though, and I would recommend this product, esp with the extra mask.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Of all the camping pillows I’ve tried, this one has been the best! My biggest complaint, as with most, is that it is so slippery that it slides around. I haven’t found a good cover to prevent this yet. It is a small pillow, but because of the small packaging size and durability, I will continue to pack it. I really like the sleep mask it came with though! Very comfortable, barely lets any light in, and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Parso

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great. It inflated quickly, is very comfortable and seems to be quite durable. I don’t see this ever getting a leak. I was hesitant to make the transition from traditional camp pillow to an inflatable. I am glad I finally made the technology pillow as this WellaX pillow folds down small enough to fit in my shirt pocket. Huge weight and space savings for ultralight thru hikes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support pillow for a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: Love this support pillow. Very well made. Easy to inflate, adjust the air to find right neck support, speedy deflate. Very light weight small when out into tiny carry pouch . Perfect for home, car, travel, hiking and camping. Comes with black out eye mask for darkness when asleep. Am very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Not good for side sleepers, and kind of squeaky
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is light and blows up quickly, and the valve lets the air out easily. The problem is, it's really thin (like 2-3 inches), so if you sleep on your side, it's almost useless. Maybe two of them stacked would work, but I found that when I tried to stack mine on anything not perfectly flat, it squeaked whenever I moved. It's also not the most comfortable to lay your head on - kind of like sleeping on rain jacket material. Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have had it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a few long flights last month and i was so happy to have this inflatable pillow. I used it on my lower back as well as used it as a pillow with my window seat. It blew up with 3 long breaths of air and deflated quickly. Takes a little bit of patience to get it back in to it's little travel bag, but I was glad to have it and won't fly without it again. Back saver!
customer_reviews.author: TexasTornado

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws ruin a good concept.
customer_reviews.text: It really is "ultralight," but it's also ultra-not used by me as a pillow because it's terribly designed for a pillow. First off, the valve makes the thing lopsided as all heck. Secondly, it is too flat for supporting your neck, which is what a pillow is primarily for. It would only take one of these to be a dealbreaker; this contains two. I now use mine as a blow up seat cushion. Lucky for me I have a small ass which fits onto it, sorta.
customer_reviews.author: JaredH.

customer_reviews.title: Really handy for naps
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for naps at the park or beach. I prefer full size pillows for camping - helps me sleep through the night easier; but that's just me. I can see this working perfectly for others, especially backpackers who are accustomed to minimalist camping. It's compact size is great for such individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha_Oe

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow. All around easy.
customer_reviews.text: Inflates easily, stores easily. Carrying bag is a definite plus. Looking forward to using this on the road. Looks like it's made well. Hope it holds up. Edit: The product info card that comes with the pillow offers a $7 Amazon gift card in exchange for an honest review. However, the email address provided to redeem this card goes nowhere. Also the review site listed on the info card redirects to Amazon's review page. Basically, it's a lie. The product seems fine but I'm deducting two stars for dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Wendigo1

customer_reviews.title: minimal running water - these pillows are great. Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a disaster relief mission in Puerto Rico and took this pillow - it was basic living; sleeping on cots, no air, minimal running water - these pillows are great. Comfy, no matter what position you sleep in, don't make your face hot and sweaty, and very light-so worth taking even when you're taking only minimal basics. Would be good for camping and deployments alike.
customer_reviews.author: sielee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pillow . I’ve used a lot of camping pillows. This one is priority one very comfortable . It’s soft and very easy to manipulate like a regular pillow. It held the air and had lots of support. In addtion , it has a nice large valve to blow it up and to deflate after you are done with it . In addition for those light weight hikers, it packs up small and it’s really light. I definetly recommend this and look forward to getting more for my friends .
customer_reviews.author: Wildhearts1999

customer_reviews.title: No neck support if you lay on your side
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is only comfortable for lying on your back. Both my husband and I bought these for a backpacking trip and couldn't sleep with them. Laying on our sides the pillow wasn't high enough to make our necks comfortable. We both had a lot of neck pain after using them. I was bummed based on all the great reviews but will have to invest in something bigger and better. It was compact, easy to inflate, and stayed inflated, but lacked the right amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow for about 5 weeks of surface, car, and in-cave camping (so far). It is lightweight, packs small, and is comfortable. It survived travel to Mexico and also the rigors of cave camping without any punctures, so I'd say it is durable. The material it is coated with is comfortable against the skin without causing stickiness or sweating (but I did not use it in a hot environment).
customer_reviews.author: Doug Warner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMPING/HOTEL PILLOW
customer_reviews.text: I received my camping pillow today, and I have to say that I’m excited to take it on my next camping trip (and to a hotel!). I like to sleep with a pillow between my legs so I got it or8marily for that purpose but I’m very happy to say that it so comfortable as a regular pillow that I’ll be buying another so I can use them for both! It’ll be great to have in a hotel as well. I love how small it is when deflated and the valve appears to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Leaks badly after 2 nights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to save room while motorcycle camping, being a smaller packed size than my foam colapable pillow. The first 2 nights it was fine, but the 3rd night it went flat. It wasn’t a puncture hole, but was leaking through the fabric. It was in a heavy flannel pillow case and didn’t contact any sharp objects. The fabric material covering doesn’t lend itself to patching.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Small Price for Big Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow is so awesome for backpacking. It's very lightweight, compact, and inexpensive. I was extremely happy with the comfort of this pillow and would recommend to anyone. I also really appreciated the inflation mechanism, so easy to inflate and deflate!!
customer_reviews.author: ayreshead

customer_reviews.title: Weigh your options carefully - a good night's sleep rests on your decision
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these recently before embarking on a semi-strenuous backpacking trip in Alaska. One performed as expected and in concurrence with other positive reviews. The other inflates but does not hold air for more than five minutes. Unfortunately for my wife, her first night's sleep of the backpacking trip was soured by the pillow malfunction. There are plenty of other similar products on amazon. Weigh your options carefully - a good night's sleep rests on your decision!
customer_reviews.author: ACARP

customer_reviews.title: Slept soundly during three nights in the Grand Canyon
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased another brand's inflatable pillow at twice the price, only to discover it had a leak (glad I tested it!). After returning it, I then opted for the Wellax camping pillow, and found it to be up to the task. Lightweight, a soft velvet feel on the surface, and it held air! I slept comfortably on my pillow, and will be bringing it on future hikes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: They’re not bad. They do come with a weird factory smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for use sleeping in my car. They’re not bad. They do come with a weird factory smell but I hand washed with almond soap and now there’s no smell. They inflate with three or four blows and pack up to next to nothing. One is good for sleeping on your back but you’ll need two if you’re a side sleeper. I would definitely by again and recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Comfortable and packs small
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is really comfortable and packs small. The material is good and soft enough no to mark your face when sleeping on the side. The best part of this purchase was the face mask. It feels good on the face and covers light really well, but do not expect silk quality. I'm paid full price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to air up and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The valve to air the pillow is unique and top notch. Easy to air up and deflate. It goes back in it's case pretty easily. The only reason for 4 stars was that there was a black streak on the pillow, hope I didn't get a used unit. I will update the review on durability as I am about to take it out on a backpacking trip at the end of May.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad odor
customer_reviews.text: The product was compact and lightweight which was good but when it arrived it had an odor like skunk so sleeping on it was not pleasant even after letting it air out it still smelled bad. It also slid around a lot
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is a nice product. The material has a very fine texture to it and the valve system works very well to effortlessly inflate and deflate the pillow. I also like how when deflated it folds up nicely and fits into its pouch. I have a bad back but I'm also very active. I'm going to try this pillow for back support while kayaking where I think it would be water resistant and very convenient to inflate, kayak, deflate and store away in its pouch. Or, perhaps I'll use it for back support or as a sleep pillow with a beach chair or chaise lounge. We’ll see...
customer_reviews.author: rjmelone

customer_reviews.title: Comfy....no more clothing “pillows”
customer_reviews.text: Picks down nicely and you can adjust the amount of air easily to your desired firmness. No longer having to shove pullover under my head. Your neck won’t get a crick when you roll on your side. Wel, at least for me. Can still use your mummy bag so only your nose and mouth are exposed to the cold. Works great for me! Need to get more for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: great value spring
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in. Wanted a "small" inflatable pillow. "Small" meaning for transport purposes. Taking a motorcycle camping trip in spring and gathering things now. It is very comfortable and a great size and deflates to a nice small size so as not to take up much valuable storage in the saddlebags or trunk of bike. I am well pleased. Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Inflates quickly and easily, deflated the same
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the size and texture of this pillow but I am SO pleasantly impressed. Inflates quickly and easily, deflated the same! The size is perfect and an awesome alternative to bringing a normal pillow camping and bringing it home smelling of campfire. Speaking of smells, doesn’t have that yucky plastic or chemical odor, which is so great. Can’t wait to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works well and good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from an overnight backpacking trip. I found this pillow to do the job! It is easy to inflate, the firmness can be adjusted by adding or releasing air, and it packs down to be quite small and light. I consider a pillow to be a "luxury" item when backpacking, and this is a nice option to have in the back country. I have purchased similar inflatable pillows for $30+ and found this one to be comparable. My one suggestion for improvement would be to consider changing the color of the stuff sack. Because it is very small and black, it can be difficult to find in a large pack of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a camping trip. They blew up and folded up super easy. Great neck support and super light weight. Will be using these on plane trips and keeping one in the car for the kiddos on road trips. Didn’t stick to my face, comfortable material. Only giving 4 stars because it was a little noisey when I rolled over & it did slip out from under my head once or twice, but you can only expect so much from a small compact item like this. Great bang for your buck for pillows of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Jml

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Backpacking Companion
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated by all the choices when I recently went to buy a inflatable pillow to accompany me on a 25 mile backpacking trip. I went with the Wellax as it was ultralight and had positive reviews. This was super easy to inflate, which was appreciated after a long day of hiking in 95 degree weather. It was easy to adjust the level of inflation when I went to bed and realized it was a little too firm for my liking. It held up well during my trip and is easy and convenient to store in my pack. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, poor quality/design. This pillow worked great for one use. I can’t blow it up because the “one-way” valve does not work. There is no way to keep the air inside while you try to close it. It immediately deflates making the pillow absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for camping or traveling
customer_reviews.text: In its bag, this pillow is tiny and easy to throw in your bag or even your pocket. It only took about two breaths to inflate and is far more comfortable than I had imagined. The shape of the pillow and the soft material work really well for neck support or even as a lumbar pillow out on a camping chair. I like it so much that I will likely pick up a second to keep in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Good traveling pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate and nice material to rest your head on. The downside I see in this product is thickness of the pillow when inflated, it doesn't offer enough support that I was hoping for. Also, the material on the opposite side of your head does not stick very well to camping material (slides around a bit). Overall, I am being picky, but a few characteristics I noted through my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Connor McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a functional pillow for camping. It's shape lends well to most sleeping bags. The height may not be as desirable as some would like so take that into consideration (it's about 4 to 5 inches inflated). It's easy to inflate as well as deflate. Recommended. The face mask works as intended although I didn't buy this product for that and I already have one of these. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DJ MinWah

customer_reviews.title: It needed to be easy to blow up and also easy for her to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my daughter to take to summer camp. It needed to be easy to blow up and also easy for her to deflate and fit into the bag. This pillow is fully inflated in about 5 puffs, deflates in seconds, and actually fits into the carry bag! The pillow is a good size and cradles your head nicely. The curve makes it good for side sleeping as well as back sleeping. My son ended up liking it better than his inflatable pillow and chose to take it on his sailing trip. This will be good for car trips and hard bleacher seats as well. So glad I opted for this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: The pillow packs up very small which is great for travel and it is really easy to inflate/deflate. The material is slippery on my tent, thermarest and sleeping bag so it is hard to keep in place. I recommend wrapping it in a shirt or something to keep it from moving around. It was not thick enough to keep my head propped up so I had to stuff clothing under it in order to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Christen L Blais

customer_reviews.title: The size is absolutely perfect for on the go traveling
customer_reviews.text: The size is absolutely perfect for on the go traveling. Fills with 3 blows of air. holds air for days. I did have a neck pain after the first night. I released some air and the second night I had no pain and slept soundly. Recommend this to all travelers. Did not overheat me, nor got too cold. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Sheba

customer_reviews.title: Will make a good air travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Will use as a back pillow for air travel. Haven’t used it yet but seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Keep your head up...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Just like the sleeping pad this is easy to inflate/deflate, is super light, and small for storage. Holds air easily through the night, and provides excellent support. No need to drop a days pay for a name brand item when this works as good as it does.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Ayers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pillow. I bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow. I bought 2 of them. The materials is soft and silky and feels comfortable against my face. Inflation is easy - about 5 breaths, and you can adjust the softness by blowing it less or more. It doesn't weight much, it's almost as light as a feather, and doesn't take up much room when deflated - about the size of a fist. Overall a great pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Derick S.

customer_reviews.title: Great lumbar support!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be sure I would have a supportive pillow for sleeping when I travel. Unfortunately, this pillow is not thick enough for my comfort. An extra inch of depth would have made it a good fit for me. However, it is perfect for lumbar support in my office chair. I just let out a little air so it conforms to my back and it is sooooo comfortable! So overall I'm glad I've got it - just not what I thought I would use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Iowagirl1029

customer_reviews.title: Truth in Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews, I decided to give the Wellax Inflatable Pillow a chance. It really DOES air up quickly! It's also very easy to let out a little air without letting out too much at once. It's nice to be able to adjust the size and firmness of this pillow in that way. The fabric is nice and construction appears to be very sturdy. It deflates quickly when you want it too and folds up compactly to stow away in backpack or luggage. I'll be using it on a camping trip in lieu of rolling up my clothes for a pillow and experiencing neck muscle pull or strain. Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.author: Lee McCleery

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow for backpacking as it is hard for me to sleep in the wilderness. I had another pillow before but it always deflated throughout the night and I ended up on the ground again. The Chillax pillow stayed inflated for three nights without having to re-inflate once and the side you sleep on has a soft material. When you move it also doesn't make noise which is nice so it doesn't wake you up frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very soft and bouncy, the fabric is smooth and comforting. I really like the inflate and deflate aspect of the pillow it is a really nice feature I didn't give it five stars because in the photos the pillow looks fatter than it really is which was the only let down about this pillow
customer_reviews.author: Maria babcock

customer_reviews.title: Alright🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. If you don't want a real pillow experience, with some head elevation, and just want to lay on you back, not your side, this will work. Probably a good airplane, tray pillow, haven't tried it for that yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Blunk

customer_reviews.title: If you backpack you need one of these!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, super compact and a great product. If you go hunting / hiking / camping you NEED to get one of these. They do not take up much space and inflate to a nice comfy pillow. Great price (got them on sale for black Friday) and super cute colors available.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Courtright

customer_reviews.title: Best inflatable cushion ever
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME! I have a slipped L4 disc and used this thing during about 16 hours worth of flights and it was perfect. It stayed in place on the plane seat and I could adjust how much support I wanted by inflating more/less. Inflates in one breath and deflates just as easily. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Chillax
customer_reviews.text: I picked this camping pillow out of the many options available because of the panda logo, and I am quite pleased with it :) Although I have not had a chance to take it with me camping yet, I have inflated it and tried it out at home. It is exactly what I wanted! It provides excellent support, packs down to about the size of a soda can and comes with a lifetime warranty. Anyone who loves sleep as much as I do will find this product really convenient to have around!
customer_reviews.author: GrlNxtDoor85

customer_reviews.title: So good I use it at home!
customer_reviews.text: So adjustable, bought ti for camping and use it for planes, hotels and when I want to nap on a couch. It takes us so little space uninflated and can be inflated easily to any firmness. Is nice and cool and did not get sweaty in desert camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend this pillow for backpacking/camping.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on long backpacking, canoeing and camping trips and it is fantastic. Compacts down to virtually nothing and it is so much cheaper than a near identical pillow in a large outdoor retailer (could run close to $60 for the same design). I normally sleep with two pillows, so this pillow is not quite tall enough on its own for my level of required support. But not an issue; if anything, I can just buy another one and stack them.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4" Thick as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this pillow is compact, lightweight and ridiculously easy to inflate / deflatehowever the 4" thickness that is advertised is only on the ends where your head would not be. The rest of the pillow is just under 3" thick and does not offer enough support for a back-sleeper like me. It seems to loose air as well.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is losing most of its air in less than an hour
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pillow I bought. The first one worked fine, so I decided to buy another one. The second one is losing most of its air in less than an hour so I decided to ask for a refund. This shows me that the product doesn't has quality control since 1 out of 2 is defective.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Worked beautifully, loved the sleeping mask!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the inflatable pillow, because it rolled up so small for packing, and the cradle shape of it was nice to sleep on. My younger son especially liked the sleep mask that came with it. My older son is a side-sleeper and has broad shoulders, and would have liked it better if the pillow had a way to become taller/thicker in that position. Maybe a future improvement would be a second air bladder to optionally inflate? All in all, I was very pleased with the purchase, and would order another one if my husband wants to come backpacking with my sons and I sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Add to your pack immediately!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used a camping pillow as all of my previous trips I did not see a point in taking one. I used this on a 3 day backpacking trip and it was amazing. It deflates and rolls up into a pouch that has a very small footprint in your pack. It inflates easily and its even easier to adjust the firmness to your liking. I'm a firm believer that adding this to your pack is worth it. You're not sacrificing weight or space in your pack and your full night's sleep will confirm that you made a great decision!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Overby

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable low back pillow
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased one of these about half a year ago because I needed something to support my lower back while driving. However, the original pillow fell out of my car, so I tried to find a substitute before buying another one. Biggest mistake I could have made -- my low back was in a lot of pain from just a few days of not having the support from the pillow. I definitely would recommend this as a low back support pillow or even just as a regular pillow (I've used it to sleep while on the go and it works well for that, too!)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable and super packable and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a camping pillow before. Instead I would just roll up a jacket or pants and tuck them under my sleeping bag. Even though I would sleep,I tossed and turned because of hard my " pillow" was. This is a different experience altogether. I can choose how hard I want my pillow by adjusting the amount of air. It's like a "sleep number" pillow albeit without the numbers. I'm glad I purchased this pillow. It even came in its own stuff sac and with eye shades for blocking light.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this camping pillow. It is really easy to inflate, it's comfortable and it stores very away small and compact. It's perfect for our camping trips. It even comes with a comfortable eye mask, which is a nice touch. It appears to be great quality. This has been a great purchase with great value.
customer_reviews.author: agildner

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like weird chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact, comes with a soft eye mask. I do have to say that it smelled terribly like chemicals. I had to immediately wash and dry it before use. Also, I own a Chillax brand camping hammock, but this appears to be another brand, perhaps knock off. It came with a nice color brochure and guarantee, but there were some grammar errors.... I mean....
customer_reviews.author: Bonesitis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable. The surface is soft without a pillow case which eliminates the requirement for the extra weight of a pillowcase for backpacking. Blows up quickly and easily and can be adjusted to be perfect for a stomach or side sleeper like me. I have used it on 3 occasions now and am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Inflatable pillow I have used...
customer_reviews.text: I have used an inflatable pillow on my sailboat for years and have tried many but this is the most comfortable I have used. Quality and design are great. Their customer service followup after sale is exemplary.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I like a much thicker pillow, but when backpacking you don't really have that option. So, with that said, overall I really liked this pillow for backpacking. Light, small, and really easy to inflate and deflate. It folds/rolls back up and fits right back into its storage pouch. Its design fits right into the head space of a mummy sleeping bag. Very good pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great backpacking pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great size when packed! It’s easy to fit something so small into a backpack with other camping gear. It would be nice if it inflated to be a little taller for side sleepers, but if you put one arm under it, it’s perfect for side or stomach sleepers. It’s already a good height for back sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Foote

customer_reviews.title: Can "squirt out" from under your head
customer_reviews.text: I like a tall pillow so this one was inflated pretty full. Unfortunately, when outside my mummy bag it can then squirt out from under your head like a lima bean or edamame! Just keep that in mind! I have used the pillow about a dozen nights and it has worked out great. Most important to me was that it is silent as a noisy pillow can wake you up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Austin

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great. Well made and can be inflated varying amounts ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great. Well made and can be inflated varying amounts to achieve your personal comfort. Never purchased from Chillax before but no sooner did i receive this product when Chillax contacted me to make sure I was completely satisfied. It turned out the pillow I received had some small breaks in the material that would probably get worse with continued use. I notified Chillax and immediately received a reply back and before I knew it, they were replacing the product. Without a doubt, I will purchase from these folks again. Thank you so much Chillax!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

product_meta.title: WELLAX Ultralight Camping Pillow - Compressible, Compact, Inflatable, Comfortable, Ergonomic Pillow for Neck & Lumbar Support and a Good Night Sleep While Camp, Backpacking
feature_bullets: ✅IMPROVED ERGONOMIC DESIGN for ENHANCED COMFORT, EFFICIENCY and DURABILITY: The WellaX inflatable pillow ensures the best neck and head support for back, side and stomach sleepers. It is constructed from strong, durable, water-resistant, elastic TPU fabric. Whether you're backpacking with your family, camping for the weekend, hiking the mountains or you simply need a lumbar support - this is the best air pillow!

✅ADJUSTABLE and MULTI-FUNCTION: the most compact and ultralight inflatable camping pillow inflates in seconds to 16 x 12 x 4 inch, which is a proper size for a good sleeping pillow or for a back support and it folds back into a small sack that is only 5 x 2 inches (less than a soda can) and weights only 2.75oz (78g). It can be easily carried in your backpack or pocket for easy access.

✅EASY TO INFLATE AND DEFLATE: Simply twist open the top portion of the double-decked air valve and blow air into it, it will only require 3-5 breaths for increased firmness. To deflate, open the bottom of the valve and roll the pillow towards the valve opening. The specially designed Two Way Valve prevent the air leak, so there will be no need of inflating it during night and you will be able to have a good night sleep.

✅SLIP-RESISTANT - The back is made of slip resist material that prevents the blow up travel pillow from unwanted sliding. It also comes with a Sleeping Mask, a sleep aid and eye relaxer, made of 100% top-quality silk, super-soft, super-smooth that offers the breathable, cool relaxation of the soothing masks found at the world’s premier spas. Always ensures you have a relaxing good night sleep!
✅NO RISK PURCHASE. Making you a happy customer is our main goal. Just try it, and if you don’t absolutely Love it, send us a message and we will Refund or Replace your Purchase, NO QUESTIONS ASKED.
